venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
This month, instead of Past Life Regression,
our metaphysical topic will be 'Life Before
Life Regression'.

Based upon the work of Helen Wambach, PhD.
and utilizing self-hypnosis, this seminar
leads you to access prenatal memories
and explore the reasons why you chose
to be born to live now, as witness to 
and participant in the great changes 
happening upon the earth. 

Discover answers to many of the questions 
you may have about your life.

Bring a pillow, mat, and blanket, if desired.

Payment may be made through PayPal or by 
cash or check. Contact Kathryn at the 
number provided with any questions.

Preregistration required, as space is limited.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: HYPNOSIS SEMINAR : Life Before Life Regression July 19
